original: Lybeck, Magnus Karl Thuresson, överstelöjtnant, Bergs ’slu&sar, f. 29/1/ 81 i Gårdeby, Östergötl. 1., av godsäg. Thure Fredrik Baltzar L. o. Anna Ekeman. G. 1. 12 m. Ingegerd Maria Eisabeth Sundstedt, d. 27; 2. 29 m. Stina Djurklon. Barnr Viveka Margareta f. 15, Ulla 30, Gunilla Birgitta 35. — Studrex. i Norrköp. 01, off rex. 03, KHS 08-10. Undrlöjtn. v. Andra liv-grenrreg. 03, löjtn. 07, kapten v. Göta livg. 17, major v. Svea livg. 28, i res. 34, överstelöjtnant. Tjg. i franska armén 22. Slussinsp. v. Mems kanalstation fr. 34. RSO, KSpMf02kl v k, RNSrtOOlkl, 2 SkytteM.
translated:
Lybeck, Magnus Karl Thuresson, Lieutenant Colonel, Bergs' sluices, born on 29/1/1881 in Gårdeby, Östergötland, son of Thure Fredrik Baltzar L. and Anna Ekeman, who were landowners. Married 1. Ingegerd Maria Eisabeth Sundstedt for 12 years; she died in 1927. Married 2. Stina Djurklon for 29 years. Children: Viveka Margareta, born in 1915, Ulla in 1930, Gunilla Birgitta in 1935. 

Educated at the Military Academy in Norrköping in 1901, commissioned officer in 1903, attended the Royal Central School of Gymnastics from 1908 to 1910. Second Lieutenant in the Second Life Grenadier Regiment in 1903, promoted to Lieutenant in 1907, Captain in the Göta Life Guards in 1917, Major in the Svea Life Guards in 1928, resigned in 1934, became Lieutenant Colonel. Served in the French army in 1922. Lock Inspector at Mems Canal Station from 1934. Knight of the Royal Order of the Seraphim, Knight First Class of the Order of the Sword, Commander of the Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav First Class, and recipient of two Marksman Medals.

achievements.name: Knight of the Royal Order of the Seraphim
Knight First Class of the Order of the Sword
Commander of the Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav First Class
